name: Guardian Angel (skelly1324)
description:
You are a guardian angel, but humanity is making your job very difficult. Soldiers face off on the battlefield with grenades, bombs, and spears, and your job is to Keep them alive!

Objective: 
Use your body and angelic aura to protect soldiers from each others projectiles. The battle will keep getting more intense until one side wins, at which point its game over. Keep them alive as long as possible!

Controls:
WASD/Arrow keys: Move
Space: Activate Aura (Heal humans and knock away objects)

Tips:
- Soldiers don't have strong allegiances, knocking them to the other side will cause them to change sides! Use this to balance power if one side is on their last legs.
- Spears become harmless after touching the ground.
- My high score is 129 seconds! Can you do better?

This game was made for Ludum dare 46, which had the theme 'Keep it alive'
